name: Red Feather Fan
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tengus/New Racial Rules/Tengu Magic Items/Red Feather Fan

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, daylight, deeper darkness

sections.body: This fan is made of copper fashioned into a dozen small feathers mounted on a ring-shaped bone handle. Once per day, the bearer can hold it and speak a command word to counterspell a darkness effect (as if using daylight) or counterspell a light effect (as if using deeper darkness). If activated in an area of overlapping light and darkness effects, the fan randomly counterspells one of them, leaving the other intact.
